t: Mark 13
Jesus Foretells Destruction of the Temple
And*p as he came out of the temple, one of his disciples said to him, “Look, Teacher, what wonderful stones and what wonderful buildings!”
And Jesus said to him, “Do*r you*r see*r these*r great*r buildings?*r There*r will*r not*r be*r left*r here*r one*r stone*r upon*r another*r that*r will*r not*r be*r thrown*r down.”*r
Signs of the End of the Age

And Jesus began to say to them, “See*r that*r no*r one*r leads*r you*r astray.*r
